ZMap Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • doc/Release_notes/release_notes.2008_07_09.shtml: new zmap release notes for 9 July 2008
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapWebPages.h: update release notes file to release_notes.2008_07_09.shtml
  • doc/Release_notes/LAST_RELEASE_DATE.txt: update last release notes to 09/07/2008
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapUtils_P.h: /var/tmp/zmap.26844/ZMap/scripts/versioner run by zmap
  • src/perl/X11-XRemote-0.01/Makefile.PL: Need to unshift X11 lib and inc dirs onto paths or they are not picked up
  • src/: include/ZMap/zmapUtils.h, zmapUtils/zmapFileUtils.c: add r, w or x tests to zMapFileAccess().
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowDrawFeatures.c: remove unused variable.
  • src/zmapView/zmapViewCallBlixem.c: add code to handle blixem configuration file cmdline arg.
  • src/zmapConfig/zmapConfig.c: add new mode param to zMapFileAccess() call.
  • src/: include/ZMap/zmapWebPages.h, zmapUtils/zmapGUIutils.c: Add entries for separate keyboard/mouse usage file.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowItemFactory.c: comment out for now an assert that causes zmap to crash during bumping.

Aceb Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • wmake/makefile: add pfetch libraries targets for http pfetch.
  • wmake/truemake: add targets for blixem http version.
  • wh/blxview.h: add missing includes for basic acedb libs.
  • w9/blxview.c: move pfetch stuff to blxFetch.c, use new config stuff to check pfetch options.
  • w9/blxmain.c: add new -c option for config file. Add code to read config.
  • w9/blixem_.h: add missing includes, add config file defs. and funcs.
  • w9/blxFetch.c: new file for pfetching and config file reading.
  • wmake/truemake: add libpfetch/libcurl builds for blixemh.
  • w9/blixem_.h: add sequence type enum for dna and peptide.
  • w9/blxFetch.c: deal with peptide an dna. Add stats for fetches. Fix bugs in 'no auth' and 'no match' handling. Fix bug in unfinished sequence handling.
  • w3/gifacemain.c, w3/tacemain.c, w3/xacemain.c, wsocket/serverace.c: add -writeaccess cmdline option so prog. starts with write access.
  • wsocket/serverace.c: fix stupid bit of message coding by me...sigh...
  • w9/blxview.c: fix buffer overrun with long sequence names...only a hack though, really needs gstrings.
  • wsocket/serverace.c: add test for -init option to force database reinit.
